basic.floral_language:
Crassula 'Pagoda Village'
Floriography:active, cute, beautiful
Has a tower-like shape, triangular leaves arranged layer by layer, bigger at the base and being smaller to the top. In a cool season with adequate sunlight, leaves turn red-brown to pink, and the plant becomes more compact. Very cute and often used to decorate desks and tables. 
Likes sunny places, has a short dormant period in summer, place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, yellow color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny turning to red brown to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
